instructions.reason_for_call: You ordered some things for your daughter but she has not received them, so you want to know which address the order was sent to, the tracking number, and if the order is still in transit. You also want to check if the storage of the tablet you ordered. Lastly, you want to change your default address to your daughter's address so that you don't have to change it every time you order something for her.
instructions.known_info: You are Lucas (lucas_santos_6600), you live in Denver CO 80239, and your daughter lives in Chicago.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a lonely man and you want to talk to the agent for a while.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I actually need some help with an order I placed for my daughter. She hasn't received it yet, and I want to check a few things about the order. Could you help me find out which address the order was sent to, the tracking number, and if it's still in transit? Also, I want to check the storage capacity of the tablet I ordered. Lastly, I'd like to change my default address to my daughter's address so I don't have to update it every time I order something for her.

message.content: Hi! I actually need some help with an order I placed for my daughter. She hasn't received it yet, and I want to check a few things about the order. Could you help me find out which address the order was sent to, the tracking number, and if it's still in transit? Also, I want to check the storage capacity of the tablet I ordered. Lastly, I'd like to change my default address to my daughter's address so I don't have to update it every time I order something for her.
